column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday November 20 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N in Fayette Co:
column4: The rightmost lane is blocked until further notice past the Newtown Pike overpass due to investigation of a serious collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N in Fayette Co:
column4: NOTE:  All lanes will be shut down again as additional equipment arrives for the investigation.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N in Fayette Co:
column4: Traffic is backed up past Exit 113 (Paris Pike).
